metadata.title: Mayan Chocolate Smoothie Recipe with BOOST

text: Start the day with a cool and creamy chocolate smoothie with protein and fibre, plus a little kick from cayenne pepper.
3/4 cup (175 ml) unsweetened vanilla flavour almond milk
Place BOOST Powder® Chocolate, banana, raspberries, cocoa, almond milk, almond butter, cinnamon and cayenne in blender. Purée until smooth.
Pour into tall glass. Sprinkle with goji berries and pepitas, if using. Serve immediately.
Increase protein in the smoothie by adding up to 3 scoops BOOST® Just Protein.
Use chocolate flavour almond milk for a more chocolatey flavour and a little added sweetness.
